title: College Algebra and Calculus An Applied Approach 2nd 2013 Larson
description:
College Algebra and Calculus: An Applied Approach, 2nd Edition (c2013), textbook by Ron Larson & Anne V. Hodgkins.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.cengage.com/search/productOverview.do?N=0&Ntk=P_Isbn13&Ntt=9781133105060" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.cengage.com/search/productOverview.do?N=0&Ntk=P_Isbn13&Ntt=9781133105060</a>
(ISBN-13: 9781133105060)

CONTENTS:
---------
0. FUNDAMENTAL CONCEPTS OF ALGEBRA
1. EQUATIONS AND INEQUALITIES
2. FUNCTIONS AND GRAPHS
3. POLYNOMIAL AND RATIONAL FUNCTIONS
4. EXPONENTIAL AND LOGARITHMIC FUNCTIONS
5. SYSTEMS OF EQUATIONS AND INEQUALITIES
6. MATRICES AND DETERMINANTS
7. LIMITS AND DERIVATIVES
8. APPLICATIONS OF THE DERIVATIVE
9. FURTHER APPLICATIONS OF THE DERIVATIVE
10. DERIVATIVES OF EXPONENTIAL AND LOGARITHMIC FUNCTIONS
11. INTEGRATION AND ITS APPLICATIONS
12. TECHNIQUES OF INTEGRATION
13. FUNCTIONS OF SEVERAL VARIABLES
14. TRIGONOMETRIC FUNCTIONS (WEB only)
15. SERIES AND TAYLOR POLYNOMIALS (WEB only)
16. PROBABILITY (WEB only)
APPENDICES (WEB only all):
 A: An Introduction to Graphing Utilities
 B: Conic Sections
 C: Further Concepts in Statistics
 D: Properties and Measurement
 E: Alternative Introduction to the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
 F: Differential Equations
 G: Formulas
 H: Graphing Utility Programs
 Chapter projects (statements + answers)
 Guide to use the Excel spreadsheet software
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (81 MB). All web-only material appended for convenience and completeness.
compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding
